attributes.description:
5 YEAR/ 100 000KM WARRANTY; 3 YEAR/ 60 000KM SERVICE PLAN
Encompassing emphatic style with a sportier look, and complemented with vibrant new paint finishes and further innovative technology, this is an SUV built with strength and character. The exterior style of the new 2008 SUV builds on its SUV strength and character. The new 2008 SUV’s interior has been designed and crafted with your lifestyle in mind, The innovative layout makes driving intuitive, agile and safe as the ergonomic driving position helps focus your attention on the road ahead.
